about_the_game:
Race high speed bio-refuse SHELLs through a dark future ruled by omni-corps and overrun with fleshy abominations. Racing Horror from Future Reality Softworks.





6-DOF Drift
Experience the next dimension of anti-gravity racing: full 6-DOF flight and aerial drifting!





SHELLs
Unlock and select from a spectrum of SHELLs - each with their own unique look, feel, and perks.





ML-AI
Machine Learning (ML) based Artificial Intelligence (AI) provides for nail-biting, frenetically paced races.





Difficulty
Multiple difficulty modes available with increasingly challenging AI: Rookie, Medium, Organ Donor, and Death Cult.





Rumble Pack Engaged
Feel the hum of your SHELL, the chop of the air, and the crackle of gamma-rays in your palms with integrated rumble support.





Future Reality OS
Heart rate too high? Sweat pouring down your face? Cool down from the circuit with Future Reality OS. Delve deep into the universe of the game via the provided Terminal.





Graphics
Select through a variety of graphics options. Fans of lo-fi / retro 3D will feel at home with our faithful, almost hypnotic defaults. Future Reality also scales up to a high resolution, clean output for players who prefer a little more breathing room.

content_descriptors.notes:
- Stylized depictions of blood, meat, and gore.

- Tense, dark, horror atmosphere.

- Death and resurrection mechanics.

name: Future Reality: Racing League

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, or DX12-capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, or DX12-capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
